alert.note: Alert for City of Chesapeake; City of Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 5:33PM EDT until July 29 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... The southeastern City of Chesapeake in southeastern Virginia... The City of Virginia Beach in southeastern Virginia... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 533 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Virginia Beach, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of , the southeastern City of Chesapeake and the City of Virginia Beach, including the following locations... Rudee Heights, Mount Pleasant, Princess Anne Plaza, Sigma, Sandbridge Beach, Oceana NAS, Munden, Macons Corner, Pungo and Bayside. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: City of Chesapeake; City of Virginia Beach
